name: DigiBros Website
desc: DigiBros is a marketing and advertising startup, based in Guntu, Andra Pradesh. This is a static landing page website for the company (on-going)

name: RipEat Website
desc: RipEat is a cloud kitchen startup, based in Bangalore. I made a static landing page website for the company with suitable design and colors. (on-going)

name: Graphic Designing
desc: This is my GFX Designing Portfolio which contains all my work in the field of Graphic Designing. I have worked with hundreds of client worldwide and this is all of it.

name: OurEye App Design
desc: This is an App design project for Oureye.ai. OurEye.ai is a Real-Time video analytics platform, based in Bangalore, India.

name: ClassX
desc: ClassX is a web app built for students at SRM University AP. This can be used to manage the lecture recordings in an efficient and less time consuming way.

name: Sanitize Squad
desc: Sanitize Squad is an android game built on Unity. The game focuses on teaching reflection and laws of reflection in a fun and gamified way.
